record.name: Bridge n8n: Enviar Mensajes LiveChat
record.code_python:
# Lógica para disparar el webhook import requests import json
webhook_url = "https://n8n.erpelantar.com/webhook/odoo-livechat-v18-production"
# Evitar bucles infinitos (no procesar mensajes que vienen de n8n si tienen un flag específico) if record.body and '<span class="n8n-bot">' not in record.body: payload = { "body": record.body, "author_id": record.author_id.id, "author_name": record.author_id.name, "res_id": record.res_id, "res_model": record.model, "message_id": record.id, } try: requests.post(webhook_url, json=payload, timeout=5) except Exception: pass
